text: Bambu may refer to: ==People== * Bambu (rapper) * André Bambu (born 1979), Brazilian professional basketball player * Robson Bambu (born 1997), Brazilian footballer ==Arts, entertainment, and media== * Bambu (album), the incomplete second album by Dennis Wilson * Big Bambú, a 2014 work of art by artists Doug and Mike Starn ==Other uses== * Bambu (rolling papers), a brand of rolling papers for hand rolled cigarettes * Bambu, Iran, a village in South Khorasan Province, Iran ==See also== * Bamboo (disambiguation) * Bambú (disambiguation)
title: Bambu
